text: StarRay is a computer game developed by Hidden Treasures and published by Logotron in 1988. Released for the Amiga, Atari ST, and Commodore 64, the game is an update on the concept of 1981 arcade game Defender, with faster gameplay and more detailed graphics and sound. The game was published in 1989 by Epyx as Revenge of Defender for the American market. In 1991, the Amiga and Atari ST versions were re-issued in the UK on Prism Leisure's "16-Bit Pocket Power" imprint. ==References== ==External links== * StarRay at Lemon Amiga * StarRay at Atari Mania * StarRay at Lemon 64 Category:1988 video games Category:Amiga games Category:Atari ST games Category:Commodore 64 games Category:Scrolling shooters Category:Video game clones Category:Video games developed in Germany
title: StarRay
